room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by RI Riddle Room in Providence
review: Great activity for families! Challenging yet fun! We all worked well together! Sad to say that with only a 19% success rate we did not solve the murder mystery... but we were just minutes away! Nonetheless what a great time we all had! We would love to return!

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by RI Riddle Room in Providence
review: Had so much fun. The Murder Mystery room was cleverly planned out. It makes you the think and keeps you on your toes. Would highly recommend if you're looking for a fun night out with friends or if you're up to meet new people and work together to solve the mystery.

room_title: Escape room "Murder Mystery" by RI Riddle Room in Providence
review: Seriously one of the best games I've done. The Murder Mystery at Riddle Room is probably my new favorite. The room was set up very thoughtfully and carefully, everything had its place and the clues were challenging yet not impossible. Our team of 10 was able to finish with a few minutes to spare.
